item.description:
Come see possible Oscar contender comedy "Silver Linings Playbook" (with Bradley Cooper & Jennifer Lawrence) at the Criterion cinema, 7:45pm showing.  2hrs.

If people want to meet before for dinner, post a comment, maybe we'll set something up.  I can also hang-out after the film.  The lobby in Criterion serves wine & beer.

I'll hang around in the lobby for a bit, then go into theater around 7:30. I'm tall (6'3")

Join the Criterion's rewards club to earn free food or movie tickets.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine)

PARKING: If you park in the 24-hour Temple St. Garage (across the street from Criterion) and get your parking ticket validated by Criterion, you get a discounted flat rate, just pay $3 no matter how long you park.
item.name: Thu. 1/10 - Silver Linings Playbook at Criterion cinema
